trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived"></xref>事件或<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataReceivedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DataReceivedEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously collect the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream output of a process, add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以异步方式收集的重定向<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>进程的输出流中，添加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: These events are raised each time the process writes a line to the corresponding redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: 进程会将行写入相应的重定向流每次会引发这些事件。

trans-unit.source: When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 当重定向的流已关闭时，null 行发送到事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your event handler checks for this condition before accessing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 确保在访问前事件处理程序检查此条件<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the `static` method <xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to validate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> property in your event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用`static`方法<xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>验证<xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A>事件处理程序中的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventArgs.Data%2A> </xref:System.String.IsNullOrEmpty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
